title: Google\Cloud\Core\GrpcRequestWrapper
name: GrpcRequestWrapper
description: The GrpcRequestWrapper is responsible for delivering gRPC requests.

params.name: config
params.description: Configuration options. Please see Google\Cloud\Core\RequestWrapperTrait::setCommonDefaults() for the other available options.

params.name: config.authHttpHandler
params.description: A handler used to deliver Psr7 requests specifically for authentication.

params.name: config.grpcOptions
params.description: gRPC specific configuration options passed off to the GAX library.

params.name: options.retries
params.description: Number of retries for a failed request. Defaults to 3.
